title: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 Custom Cookie Name Issue
description: The documentation for Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 mentions that custom cookie names affect URL rewriting, but there seems to be an issue with this behavior.
OB: The observed behavior is not provided in the bug report.
EB: Expected behavior: According to the documentation in chapter 7.1.1, if custom cookie names affect URL rewriting, I would expect the 'Reload' link to be 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a web browser.
2. Navigate to 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp'.
3. Observe the 'Reload' link and check the URL structure.
